summary.title: Keep track of your snippets
summary.text: Clipboard instantly stores any item you copy in the cloud, meaning you can access your snippets immediately on all your devices. Our Mac and iOS apps will help you organize everything.

pics.alt: Desktop screen with a background of blue waves seen from above, topped by a checked icon.

details.title: Quick Search
details.text: Easily search your snippets by content, category, web address, application, and more.

details.title: iCloud Sync
details.text: Instantly saves and syncs snippets across all your devices.

details.title: Complete History
details.text: Retrieve any snippets from the first moment you started using the app.
